channel.title: Mixed Extents
channel.description: A database technology podcast brought to you by the EightKB team. Each month we discuss current and relevant database topics with a panel of community experts.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Mixed Extents Podcast by EightKB
channel.itunes:author: EightKB

item.title: 00: Database Backups
item.itunes:author: EightKB
item.description:
In our first episode we talk with Argenis Fernandez and Mike Fal about backups, storage, and the future of both.
GUESTS Argenis Fernandez Blog: https://www.0xsql.com/ Twitter: https://twitter.com/DBArgenis
Mike Fal Blog: http://www.mikefal.net/ Twitter: https://twitter.com/Mike_Fal
RESOURCES Argenis runs some tests to prove that you can trust storage snapshots for quick crash-consistent restores: https://www.0xsql.com/2020/06/10/pure-storage-flasharray-sql-server-snapshot-torture-you-kinda-asked-for-this/
Intro sound from Freesound: https://freesound.org/people/Kleber_KGF/sounds/354019/

item.title: 01: Cloud vs. On-Prem
item.itunes:author: EightKB
item.description:
In this episode we talk with David Klee, Joey D'Antoni, and Melody Zacharias about on-prem vs. cloud infrastructure, skills needed for the transition, and current limitations of the cloud. We also get to see how Mark can't get his own co-hosts' (and co-workers') name right!
GUESTS David Klee Blog: https://davidklee.net Twitter: https://twitter.com/kleegeek
Joey D'Antoni Blog: https://joeydantoni.com Twitter: https://twitter.com/jdanton
Melody Zacharias Blog: https://sqlmelody.com Twitter: https://twitter.com/sqlmelody
Intro sound from Freesound: https://freesound.org/people/Kleber_KGF/sounds/354019/

item.title: 02: Indexing and Stats Maintenance
item.itunes:author: EightKB
item.description:
In this episode we talk with Erik Darling and Erin Stellato about index maintenance, statistics, and the Index Maintenance Revolution! We also get to see more failed attempts at getting Andrew's name correct during our intro.
RESOURCES From Erin: https://www.sqlskills.com/blogs/erin/updating-statistics-with-ola-hallengrens-script/ https://www.sqlskills.com/blogs/erin/sqlskills-sql101-updating-sql-server-statistics-part-i-automatic-updates/ https://www.sqlskills.com/blogs/erin/sqlskills-sql101-updating-sql-server-statistics-part-ii-scheduled-updates/ https://www.sqlskills.com/blogs/erin/troubleshooting-a-change-in-query-performance/
From Erik: https://www.erikdarlingdata.com/sql-server/because-your-index-maintenance-script-is-measuring-the-wrong-thing/ https://www.erikdarlingdata.com/sql-server/what-metrics-does-rebuilding-indexes-improve/ https://www.erikdarlingdata.com/sp_humanevents/ https://www.erikdarlingdata.com/sp_pressuredetector/
GUESTS Erik Darling Blog: https://www.erikdarlingdata.com/ Twitter: https://twitter.com/erikdarlingdata
Erin Stellato Blog: https://www.sqlskills.com/blogs/erin/ Twitter: https://twitter.com/erinstellato
Intro sound from Freesound: https://freesound.org/people/Kleber_KGF/sounds/354019/

item.title: 03: Query Store
item.itunes:author: EightKB
item.description:
In this episode we talk with Tracy Boggiano and William Durkin about Query Store, Open Query Store, and the fun of writing books. We also introduce a new feature that Andrew abuses and encourages the guests to abuse as well.
GUESTS Tracy Boggiano Blog: http://databasesuperhero.com/ Twitter: https://twitter.com/TracyBoggiano
William Durkin Blog: https://datamasterminds.io/blog/ Twitter: https://twitter.com/sql_williamd
LINKS FROM THE SHOW
Mixed Extents T-Shirts: https://www.bonfire.com/store/eightkb/
Posts from Tracy: https://tracyboggiano.com/archive/2018/06/query-store-error-state/ https://tracyboggiano.com/archive/2018/06/query-store-usage-and-adaptive-plan-tuning-usage/
Tracy at PASS Summit: https://www.pass.org/summit/2020/Learn/Session-Details/sid/104557 Tracy's Book: https://www.amazon.com/Query-Store-SQL-Server-2019/dp/1484250036
Links from William: Company: https://datamasterminds.io/ Open Query Store: https://www.openquerystore.com/ Data Grillen: https://datagrillen.com/ William's Books: https://www.amazon.com/William-Durkin/e/B073722MP7
Intro sound from Freesound: https://freesound.org/people/Kleber_KGF/sounds/354019/

item.title: 04: HA/DR
item.itunes:author: EightKB
item.description:
In our first episode we talk with Pam Lahoud and John Martin about HA/DR, what folks tend to get wrong, and what you need to think about when you are setting up a plan for your own environment.
GUESTS Pam Lahoud Blog: https://sqlgoddess.com/ Twitter: https://twitter.com/SQLGoddess
John Q. Martin Blog: https://jqmartin.info/ Twitter: https://twitter.com/SQLDiplomat
Intro sound from Freesound: https://freesound.org/people/Kleber_KGF/sounds/354019/

item.title: 05: Year in Review
item.itunes:author: EightKB
item.description:
In our sixth and final episode of 2020, we talk with some of the leaders in the data community that stepped up and helped fill the conference gap this year. We had a full panel and discussed everything from sponsors to the future of events in general.
SUPPORT EIGHTKB AND MIXED EXTENTS! Pick up a t-shirt at our bonfire shop if you like what you are seeing and want to continue to support EightKB and Mixed Extents: https://www.bonfire.com/store/eightkb/
GUESTS Blythe Morrow Site: https://paperswordb2b.com/ Twitter: https://twitter.com/blythemorrow
Kevin Feasel Blog: https://curatedsql.com Twitter: https://twitter.com/feaselkl
William Durkin Blog: https://datamasterminds.io/blog/ Twitter: https://twitter.com/sql_williamd
Mark Hayes Site: https://www.datasmart.ie/ Twitter: https://twitter.com/MarkDataGuy
Stuart Moore Blog: https://stuart-moore.com/ Twitter: https://twitter.com/napalmgram
RESOURCES Events: - GroupBy: https://groupby.org/ - Data Architecture Day: https://www.meetup.com/tripass/events/270069440 - New Stars of Data: https://www.newstarsofdata.com/ - Data Weekender: https://www.dataweekender.com/ - Data Platform Discovery Day: https://dataplatformdiscoveryday.com/
Intro sound from Freesound: https://freesound.org/people/Kleber_KGF/sounds/354019/

item.title: 06: Azure SQL
item.itunes:author: EightKB
item.description:
In this episode we talk with Anna Hoffman and Bob Ward about Azure SQL. We talk about what it is, why you might want to think about using it, and we also share some good resrouces to get free training.
GUESTS Ann Hoffman Podcast: https://aka.ms/DataExposedYT Twitter: https://twitter.com/AnalyticAnna
Bob Ward Blog: https://bobsql.com/ Twitter: https://twitter.com/bobwardms
RESOURCES Data Exposed Podcast - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCNsev6sULZ_Zp06VL7uktuA Anna's Book - https://aka.ms/azuresqlfordevelopers Bob's Book - https://aka.ms/azuresqlbook Azure SQL Fundamentals - https://aka.ms/azuresqlfundamentals Azure SQL Free content on youtube - https://aka.ms/azuresql4beginners Hotpatching Article - https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/blog/hot-patching-sql-server-engine-in-azure-sql-database/
Intro sound from Freesound: https://freesound.org/people/Kleber_KGF/sounds/354019/

item.title: 07: Next Gen Data Platforms
item.itunes:author: EightKB
item.description:
In this episode we talk with Christopher Adkin, Argenis Fernandez, Benjamin Weissman, and Melody Zacharias about the next generation data platforms like Kubernetes and Arc-Enabled Data Services. We talk about the future of these platforms, the challenges folks are seeing in the wild, and why SQL Server 2008 RS will never go away.
GUESTS Christopher Adkin Twitter: https://twitter.com/ChrisAdkin8
Argenis Fernandez Blog: https://www.0xsql.com/ Twitter: https://twitter.com/DBArgenis
Benjamin Weissman Blog: https://www.solisyon.de/blog/ Twitter: https://twitter.com/bweissman
Melody Zacharias Blog: https://sqlmelody.com​ Twitter: https://twitter.com/sqlmelody
RESOURCES Azure Arc-Enabled Data Services Revealed [Book] - https://www.apress.com/us/book/9781484267042
Intro sound from Freesound: https://freesound.org/people/Kleber_KGF/sounds/354019/

item.title: 08: EightKB Summer Edition!
item.itunes:author: EightKB
item.description:
In this episode we are super excited to talk to.... US! We discuss the upcoming EightKB Summer Edition, announce the date for our next call for speakers, share a bit about our planning process, and show off a new t-shirt design just for the 2021 EightKB Summer event.
GUESTS Andrew Pruski Blog: https://dbafromthecold.com Twitter: https://twitter.com/dbafromthecold
Mark Wilkinson Blog: https://markw.dev Twitter: https://twitter.com/m82labs
Anthony Nocentino Blog: https://centinosystems.com/blog Twitter: https://twitter.com/nocentino
RESOURCES Call for Data Speakers: https://callfordataspeakers.com/ EightKB Homepage: https://eightkb.online EightKB/Mixed Extents Bonfire Store: https://www.bonfire.com/store/eightkb/
Intro sound from Freesound: https://freesound.org/people/Kleber_KGF/sounds/354019/
